mapper.insert: insert into "patient" (ID, FIRST_NAME, MID_NAME, LAST_NAME, GENDER_ID, BIRTHDAY, PHONE, EMAIL, ADDRESS) values (NEXTVAL('patient_seq'), #{firstName}, #{middleName}, #{lastName}, #{gender}, #{birthday}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{address});
mapper.update: update "patient" set first_name = #{firstName}, mid_name = #{middleName}, last_name = #{lastName}, gender_id = #{gender}, birthday = #{birthday}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, address = #{address} where id = #{id};
